text: Pus yousuf ney inn kay saman ki talash kerna shuroo ki apney bhai kay saman ki talashi say pehlay phir uss paymaney ko apnay bhai kay saman (zanbeel) say nikala. Hum ney yousuf kay liye issi tarah yeh tadbeer ki. Uss badshah kay qanoon ki roo say yeh apney bhai ko na ley sakta tha magar yeh kay Allah ko manzoor ho. Hum jiss kay chahayen darjay buland ker den her zee ilm per foqiyat rakhney wala doosra zee ilm mojood hai
